tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am part of the scared species of patients when it comes to dental treatments. I chose to consult Dr Nikita only after reading some of the stellar reviews and boy, I am glad to have made the right decision. Dr Nikita ensures patients' comfort before the treatment. Tooth extraction is supposed to be the most painful treatment in dentistry but I am not exaggerating when I say that my tooth extraction was a complete painless experience. my post extraction treatment has also been great and Dr Nikita has not charged me yet considering that the bridge implementation is still pending. howmuchever I have tried to pay upfront, I have been told that the fee is due only once treatment is completed. though I am based abroad, I am happy to say that Dr Nikita has displayed thorough professionalism, a trait which is very rare amidst the medical fraternity in India. so much so that I have already decided to consult her again during my next visit to India, even if it means me to digress from my destination in India.Dr Nikita is also a specialist in Sleep and Snoring disorder and both myself and my wife have consulted her. similar to the above, our experience has been tremendously good. ***** * ****** ** *** ***** *** ******** ******* ********* ** *** ******* we are glad to avail her services as it's very seldom that you come across such a doctor. thank you Dr Nikita for all your help in our medical journey here in India.

Highly Recommend
Dr Nikita is an awesome dentist. She is really friendly and takes adequate time to listen to her patients. The best thing about her is that she is so calm and patient that it wasn't scary it get my dental treatment done from her(I have always been really scared of dental problems). She also explained me details about my problem which a lot of doctors avoid, so that helped me understand my problem better. I also found her to be very unbiased and practical ** *** ****** *** ** ** *** *** *********** *********** just exactly what was appropriate. Her clinic is extremely clean and her staff was also very welcoming. I have recommended her to my friends and family and they all have been really satisfied with her consultation and treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is the most experienced doctor I have ever met. She does a wonderful job. She is extremely patient and understands the patients needs. Extremely friendly and respectful of the patients requirements. Follows up very well. Thank you so much Doctor! Keep the great work! :)

She is one of the fewest doctors in the city who would actually care for her patients. Not only does she give a great treatment, she also helps you understand what's good for your teeth and what things you should do to avoid dental problems. 

Even in covid scenario, I didn't feel any safety concern in her chamber. I would recommend her to everyone.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My visit to Dr Nikita was for my tooth pain, she explained the issue and advised for removal of tooth. Dr was available at the time I reached which was nice as there was no wait time and she explained the issue.
However few improvement I felt to be required:
1) I was charged Rs,100 for X-ray which has not been told to be before doing x-ray . I believe patient should be informed before of any extra charges apart from consultation fee which I paid Rs,300.
2) X-ray report has not provided to me which later I have asked for and still not received which shows lack of professionalism
3) Charges are high for the treatment advised compared to others I have enquired.
4) While explaining the issues it was not in too details to understand the root cause , ** *** **** ** *********
Overall it was ok and hope above suggestions do help for future.
reply_text:
Regarding your concerns. 
1. Xray is a diagnostic modality which is chargeable and since we have a setup that allows it. I don‚Äôt understand how it should be inclusive. 
2. The xray report was sent to you on your personal number during the work timings of the clinic. 
3. Comparing treatment fees is offensive and is very subjective and we cannot help you with this. 
4.  I am glad you found your answers elsewhere. Our main motto is to help you.

review: Let me start from the first visit, we asked her some questions with respect to how we will take the treatment forward and do we have any other alternatives. To which her response was really rude. Shes seemed to get irrirated with the questions and replied very unprofesionally. She is not at all patient friendly *** **** **** ** **** My wife told me not to proceed with her for the procedure but I took a call that ok may be we got her wrong giving her the benefit of doubt. But my wife was right. *** *** ******** **** **** *** ********* *** moresoever the atmosphere inside clinic was like a fish market. She does not respect time of her patients plus the price of treatment which she quoted me at beginning varied quite a bit and she kept on changing the fees and structure. When I raised that issue, she left my treatment in between and said she wont continue. She drilled my entire tooth for putting the crown and my gums were bleeding. But she dint bother and left the treatment as it is. Mine has been a horrible experience. Please think twice before proceeding with the treatment.
reply_text: Thankyou for your valuable feedback. But i always explain my patients my treatment and fees explicitly on their first visit. If you are unwilling to pay the doctor their fees that says a lot about you and not me. I didn‚Äôt leave my treatment midway , you refused to pay my fee. Thankyou dearly for this wonderful experience. I will be careful from now onwards

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Appointment system is brilliant and always very accommodating with times. The level of hygiene is also highly appreciated. Just have to say a very caring dentist who reassures the patients, gives excellent service and explains what they are doing at every step of the way. Thank you Dr. Nikita for the great experience and quality of work you have done.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I recommended my friend to visit this place as she was having tooth ache .She was treated with much care and all the steps were explained to her beforehand to reduce her anxiety (first dentist visit ).I would surely recommend this doctor üëçüèª

I would strongly recommend Dr. Parasrampuria for dental treatments. Not only is she very experienced doctor, she had been very delicate with my treatment and was always available to help me in case I had any dental discomfort. She‚Äôs been my dentist for one year now and I am more than satisfied with her services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Dental Examinations,
review: It was my first visit for my mom. The dr is very nice. She herself called in morning and informed about her sudden changes in schedule but after listening to my problems she preponed my mom‚Äôs appointment and given her priority. It seems she can feel her pain and she postponed her hospital schedule and gave full focus on my mom and addressed her issues. She is a very good Counselor Her colleague Dr Namrata also is very nice . She did RTC very well and every moment she was ensuring that my mom should not feel any pain. Loved the hospitality and highly satisfied with the treatment and advice.

Highly Recommended! On my very first visit, the doctor took & interpreted the X-ray, diagnosed my dental problem thereafter explained and implemented treatment plans. 

She gave explicit instructions for the making of dentures and supervised their fitting. She also demonstrated a special talent for working with the elderly patients in the practice calming their nerves and making them feel comfortable with their dentures. She was clear and precise when explaining the proper care of dentures and patiently answered all questions thoroughly.

It is with great pleasure that I recommend Dr. Nikita Parasrampuria for her expertise, care and way of conduct with patients.
*** ** **** **** ****** ****** **** ********** Her behaviour is very nice. Patient while under going treatment feels very comfortable.

reply_text: Thankyou for these generous words. You are really very kind. Hoping to keep helping you smile better in the days to come too !

review: I was suffering from unbearable pain in my right lower back tooth during the lockdown and luckily i found dr. Nikita available. She performed an emergency For me and eased my pain. I am highly grateful for her effort towards me in this time of crisis. I would highly recommend her for her selflessness and service

I went to Dr. Parasrampuria for my root canal and I would like to share that the services provided by her were extremely professional and least painful I had experienced. I would highly recommend her to my family and friends. Her friendly behaviour made sure that I don't feel nervous or anxious at all. Also till date I have not incurred any problems with that tooth which speaks of her great work.
She was not friendly at all. She was not ready to give answer to some of the query and got irritated when you ask something. Not recommended to anyone
